title: Quora Scraper input schema
description: This is actor input schema for Quora Scraper, it lets you provide search term for your run.

query.title: Search term
query.description: Quora will search for questions using this string.
query.prefill: What is the best way to learn to code?

answersBatchSize.title: Answers batch size
answersBatchSize.description: Crawler will fetch answers for a particular question in batches of this size. It uses a sane default, but increasing it too much, although will decrease the number of API hits, might introduce problems in an unexpected way. If this paramter is higher than maxAnswersPerQuestion, the questions scraped with last batch will be persisted, even if they overcome that limit.

maxAnswersPerQuestion.title: Max answers per question
maxAnswersPerQuestion.description: Depending on popularity of your query you may encounter questions with many thousands of answers. Scraping these will require a ton of requests, especially if there are many such questions. Set to 0 to avoid scraping questions altogether and to -1 to disable this limit

answersRanking.title: Answers ranking
answersRanking.description: Sort answers by selected parameter. On original Quora website you can also include related answers with this option, but currently this isn't supported.

proxy.title: Proxy configuration
proxy.description: Select proxies to be used by your crawler. NOTE: residential proxies may not work with this scraper

maxPoolSize.title: Max pool size
maxPoolSize.description: Maximum number of sessions in the pool

maxAgeSecs.title: Max age of each session
maxAgeSecs.description: Maximum age of sessions in the pool

maxUsageCount.title: Max usage count of each session
maxUsageCount.description: Maximum number of times a session can be used
